name: Grand Theft Auto V
notes: The game works with no problems if you don't change the default installation path.

files.setup: N/A:Select the installer for GTA V (setup.exe)

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the installer for GTA V (setup.exe)
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Rockstar Games/GTA V/gta_v.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing GTA V...
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
